DOC.brief_summary: Study compare PK new 120mg tablet two 60mg tablet . This required plan single tablet administer later phase clinical trial 120mg strength . As new previously untested strength need ensure PK similar achieve use 2x60mg start large manufacturing campaign administer large number patient . The study plan consist single part , two dose period , period 1 2 consist 18 subject . There 20 day washout dose . Initially 4 subject give single oral dose 120 mg SB-773812 2 give placebo . If 120mg SB-773812 well tolerate first four volunteer , remain 12 subject dose . If 120mg single oral dose first 4 subject poorly tolerate , study stop . Subjects return centre follow-up 14 21 day final dose.It expect total duration study approximately 11 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Healthy Volunteer Study Assess Relative Bioavailability 2 Forms SB773812 Tablets .
